Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.name: timestamp
Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.abstract: Relative time to when the recorder was started.

Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.name: timestampDate
Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.abstract: The date timestamp when the measurement was taken.

Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.name: timestampUnix
Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.abstract: The Unix timestamp (seconds since 1970-01-01T00:00:00.000Z) when the measurement was taken.

Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.name: horizontalAccuracy
Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.abstract: Returns the horizontal accuracy of the location in meters; nil if the lateral location is invalid.

Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.name: relativeDistance
Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.abstract: Returns the lateral distance between the current location and the previous location in meters.

Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.name: latitude
Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.abstract: Returns the latitude coordinate of the current location; nil if only relative distance

Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.name: longitude
Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.abstract: Returns the longitude coordinate of the current location; nil if only relative distance

Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.name: verticalAccuracy
Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.abstract: Returns the vertical accuracy of the location in meters; nil if the altitude is invalid.

Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.name: altitude
Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.abstract: Returns the altitude of the location in meters. Can be positive (above sea level) or negative (below sea level).

Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.name: totalDistance
Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.abstract: Sum of the relative distance measurements if the participant is supposed to be moving.

Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.name: course
Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.abstract: Returns the course of the location in degrees true North; nil if course is invalid.

Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.name: bearingRadians
Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.abstract: Returns the bearing to the location from the previous location in radians (clockwise from) true North.

Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.name: speed
Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.abstract: Returns the speed of the location in meters/second; nil if speed is invalid.

Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.name: floor
Structs/RSDDistanceRecord.html#/s:16Rese.abstract: Returns the floor of the building where the location was recorded; nil if floor is not available.
